00023 #pragma once
00024 
00025 #include <l4/sys/utcb.h>
00026 #include <l4/sys/atomic.h>
00027 #include <l4/sys/compiler.h>
00028 #include <l4/sys/ipc.h>
00029 
00030 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00031 l4_usem_down_to(l4_cap_idx_t lock, l4_u_semaphore_t *sem, l4_timeout_s timeout) L4_NOTHROW
00032 {
00033   do
00034     {
00035       if (__builtin_expect(l4_atomic_add((long*)&(sem->counter), -1) >= 0, 1))
00036   return l4_msgtag(0, 0, 0, 0);
00037 
00038       l4_utcb_mr()->mr[0] = (l4_addr_t)sem;
00039 
00040       register unsigned long _lock    __asm__ ("r2") = lock | L4_SYSF_CALL;
00041       register unsigned long _timeout __asm__ ("r3") = timeout.t;
00042       register unsigned long _flags   __asm__ ("r4") = 0;
00043       register l4_msgtag_t   _tag     __asm__ ("r0") =
00044         l4_msgtag(0 /*L4_SEMAPHORE_DOWN*/, 1, 0, 0);
00045 
00046       __asm__ __volatile__
00047   ("@ l4_usem_down_to (semaphore block) \n\t"
00048    PIC_SAVE_ASM
00049    "mov     lr, pc       \n\t"
00050    "mov     pc, %[sys]   \n\t"
00051    PIC_RESTORE_ASM
00052    :
00053    "=r" (_lock),
00054    "=r" (_timeout),
00055    "=r" (_flags),
00056    "=r" (_tag.raw)
00057    :
00058    "0" (_lock),
00059    "1" (_timeout),
00060    "2" (_flags),
00061    "3" (_tag.raw),
00062    [sys] "i" (L4_SYSCALL_INVOKE)
00063    :
00064    "cc", "memory", "lr"
00065         );
00066 
00067       if (l4_msgtag_label(_tag) != L4_USEM_RETRY)
00068   {
00069     l4_msgtag_t t;
00070           t.raw = _tag.raw;
00071     return t;
00072   }
00073     }
00074   while (1);
00075 }
00076 
00077 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00078 l4_usem_up(l4_cap_idx_t lock, l4_u_semaphore_t *sem) L4_NOTHROW
00079 {
00080   l4_atomic_add((long*)&(sem->counter), 1);
00081 
00082   if (__builtin_expect(sem->flags == 0, 1))
00083     return l4_msgtag(0,0,0,0);
00084 
00085   l4_utcb_mr()->mr[0] = (l4_addr_t)sem;
00086 
00087   register unsigned long _lock    __asm__ ("r2") = lock | L4_SYSF_CALL;
00088   register unsigned long _timeout __asm__ ("r3") = 0;
00089   register unsigned long _flags   __asm__ ("r4") = 0;
00090   register unsigned long _tag     __asm__ ("r0") =
00091     l4_msgtag(1 /* L4_SEMAPHORE_UP_WITHOUT_YIELD */, 1, 0, 0).raw;
00092 
00093   __asm__ __volatile__
00094     ("@ l4_usem_up (semaphore block) \n\t"
00095      PIC_SAVE_ASM
00096      "mov     lr, pc       \n\t"
00097      "mov     pc, %[sys]   \n\t"
00098      PIC_RESTORE_ASM
00099      :
00100      "=r"(_lock),
00101      "=r"(_timeout),
00102      "=r"(_flags),
00103      "=r"(_tag)
00104      :
00105      "0"(_lock),
00106      "1"(_timeout),
00107      "2"(_flags),
00108      "3"(_tag),
00109      [sys] "i" (L4_SYSCALL_INVOKE)
00110      :
00111      "cc", "memory", "lr");
00112 
00113   l4_msgtag_t t; t.raw = _tag;
00114   return t;
00115 }
